title: a summary of the city's history
text:
(88421) 2015-07-06 3:46 
Hello Ourania, There are lots to see in this attractive well balanced composition. The eyes move naturally and gradually up the frame moving from one element to the next. The image is very nicely illuminated and has excellent colours and clarity. (26635) 2015-07-06 3:47 
Hi Ourania This is a varied architectural landscape with lots and lots of colour and detail to interest the eye. The Erectheon has always been one of my favourite buildings, I even have a black and white drawing of it in my house! You have a very pleasant exposure and light in this fine photo. Thanks as always, wishing you the best of everything from Ireland. Cheers
